SEARCH

Class Suggestion

java.lang.Object
Suggestion
public class Suggestion extends Object
This is a suggestion class that stores the suggestion information for camps. It contains the name of the suggester, the suggestion, the approval status of the suggestion, the processed status of the suggestion, the suggestion ID and the camp name.
Since:
2023-11-24
Version:
1.0
